tool.name: SAGA.climate_tools.8
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayT False isArrayT_MIN False isArrayT_MAX False output_data_PET $output_data_PET name SAGA.climate_tools.8 T $T T_MIN $T_MIN T_MAX $T_MAX LAT $LAT TIME $TIME MONTH $MONTH DAY $DAY prefer $prefer response $response outputType_PET $OutputSection_PET.outputType_PET transmissionMode_PET $OutputSection_PET.transmissionMode_PET

param.name: T
param.label: Mean Temperature
param.help: Mean Temperature The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff

param.name: T_MIN
param.label: Minimum Temperature
param.help: Minimum Temperature The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff

param.name: T_MAX
param.label: Maximum Temperature
param.help: Maximum Temperature The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_PET
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PET
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: Estimation of daily potential evapotranspiration from daily average, minimum and maximum temperatures using Hargreave's empirical equation. In order to estimate extraterrestrial net radiation geographic latitude of observation and Julian day have to be supplied too.
